name: Call of Beans - Grain and Kernel
name_original: Call of Beans - Grain and Kernel
description:
Call of beans is a solo project only made in unity. It's a cod remake mostly inspired by Cod Bo2. Everything is made in unity with cubes.  It uses Photon Pun multiplayer and is currently capped at 20 online players.

Beware if you download the game and cant play, it's probably because there are more then 20 players online.

Loadout

There are currently 20 weapons in the game.

3 Kill streaks you can use and 4 Throwables.

Maps

NukeTown

Raid

Premium codes are just going to be cosmetics and xp boost
Content: 1 universal camo, 2x XP.
Upcoming:  custom death particle

It's mostly for support of de game. It's still work in progress and I'm open for suggestion.
